text: V samom dele, chemu podobna zdeshnyaya zhizn'? Ona podobna vode, kotoruyu nizvodim My s neba, i kotoroy pitayutsya zemnyye rasteniya, kakiye yedyat lyudi i skot. V to vremya kak zemlya nadenet na sebya svoi krasivyye ubory, naryaditsya v nikh, i obitateli yeye dumayut, chto oni delayut eto s neyu, - v techeniye kakoy libo nochi ili dnya prikhodit k ney Nashe poveleniye, i ona delayetsya kak by pozhatoyu, tak chto budto ona i ne byla vchera tak bogatoyu. Tak yasno ukazyvayem My znameniya lyudyam razmyshlyayushchim
